Detailed Description

Interface for ruler implementation.

Ruler allow to set a values at different positions on different levels. Level 0 is the most important.

virtual void iview::IRuler::Clear ( ) [pure virtual]

Remove all marks, but doesn't change reserved space.

virtual int iview::IRuler::GetLevelsCount ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get count of levels.

Higher levels have lower priority.

virtual Mark iview::IRuler::GetMark ( int  markIndex,
int  levelIndex 
) const [pure virtual]

Get a mark.

First element of the mark is a relative position on ruler in range [0, 1]. Second element is the value.
